summary: A simple mod which renames all glass weapons and armor to malachite.
descriptionHtml:
This is a mod which does simply what the name implies. It changes the name of all glass weapons and armor to say "Malachite" instead of "Glass". The smithing perk "Glass Smithing" has also been changed to "Malachite Smithing" along with a subtle change in the description.

Examples:
﻿ ﻿ ﻿Glass Sword -> Malachite Sword
﻿ ﻿ Glass Arrow -> Malachite Arrow
﻿ ﻿ ﻿Glass Armor -> Malachite Armor
﻿ ﻿ ﻿Hallowed Glass Bow -> Hallowed Malachite Bow
author: Kejoko
